com.sitewhere.spi.configuration

Interface IGlobalConfigurationResolver


  • public interface IGlobalConfigurationResolver
    Pluggable resolver for interacting with global configuration data.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilesystemConfigurationRoot

        @Deprecated
java.net.URI getFilesystemConfigurationRoot()
                                                 throws com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the URI for the root folder on the filesystem where configuration elements can be stored. This is being phased out by use of the IResourceManager implementation and will be removed.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.sitewhere.spi.SiteWhereException
